Projects

These are several more recent works. They are mostly selected to illustrate some of my quantitative analysis and R techniques. As time goes by, I will slowly add older work.

GPSC Survey

For the past few months we’ve been creating a very comprehensive and future-focused survey of graduate and professional students at Southern Illinois University. More details…

American Nationalism and the ‘Cruse of Rurality’

For the master paper, I identified theoretically and empirically neglected aspect of nationalism. After providing a decent theoretical argument, I identify indicative new patterns in General Social Survey data. Rather interesting, and quite current. More details…

Analysis of Traffic at Belgrade Airport

More technical sample. While the report is nice looking, what goes behind it is scrapping of the data from Wikipedia, some wrangling of strings and tables, accessing APIs, creating maps and flight paths. I also tried to use diverse figures and charts. See here…

Reproducing Data for Airport Nis
